item.title: UK Supreme Court Says Trans Women Are Not Legally Women Under Equality Act
item.description: Britain’s Supreme Court ruled that the word “woman” referred to biological sex under the country’s anti-discrimination law, in a blow to trans rights ...

item.title: British Court Rules Legal Definition of Women is Based on Biological Sex
item.description: Britain’s Supreme Court ruled on Wednesday that trans women do not meet the legal definition of female under the country’s Equality Act.
